title.en: English for Advanced Learners (100% Web-Based), Level B2 > C1
title.et: Inglise keel kõrgtasemele (100% e-õpe), tase B2 > C1

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: - Upon completion of the course the students are supposed to have increased their vocabulary in different registers (academic and semi-academic), broadened their horizons, developed their skills of participating in academic web-based discussions as well as developed  their skills of making web-based presentations.
description.et: Sõnavara suurendamine ja maailmapildi avardamine erinevate tekstide baasil. Lugemisoskuse edasiarendamine, valik- ja lünktestide täitmise harjutamine, teksti sisu mõistmise, leksikaalsete ja grammatiliste seoste ning õigekirja arendamine. Loetud tekstide üle arutamine akadeemilises veebipõhises diskusioonis.

objectives.en: The main aim of the course is to develop the students' vocabulary and improve their knowledge of English through intensive individual ICT-supported work. To participate in the course you must have the will and capacity to carry out individual work within a fixed time-frame.
objectives.et: Süvendada ja täiendada eelnevalt omandatud intensiivse iseseisva veebipõhise töö abil. Iseseisva töö ja oma aja planeerimise oskus on osalemise eeltingimus.

learning_outcomes.en: Students who have successfully passed the course
- have broadened their vocabulary in English
learning_outcomes.et: - on suurendanud oma sõnavara inglise keeles

learning_outcomes.en: - have become acquainted with the general and topical issues discussed on the course
learning_outcomes.et: - on kursis kursusel käsitletud üld- ning päevakajaliste teemadega

learning_outcomes.en: - are able to use different appropriate styles for academic communication: written semi-formal academic discussion between team-members (Forum); academic formal style for reviews; making reports ( video recordings students put up on the net, provided they have the required equipment and skills, if not, a Powerpoint, Prezi etc. presentation).
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kasutada erinevaid suhtlemisstiile akadeemilises arutelus: kirjalik vabam stiil foorumis; kirjalik akadeemiline kõrgstiil diskussioonide kokkuvõtete koostamisel; ettekannete esitamine (videolingi teel, kui on tudengil olemas vastav tehnika ja oskused seda kasutada; alternatiivina Powerpoint, Prezi vms ettekande vormis)

learning_outcomes.en: - can organize, pace and evaluate their individual work.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab korraldada, analüüsida ja hinnata oma iseseisvat tööd.
